commit message: Clouds getting more and more prepared for releasing.
Classes and many members declared as final.
init(..) methods renamed and other changes.
Final modifier added to class introduction.
Version code and name increased plus fading edges added.
Colors changed + plus cloud point shading rewritten.
8bit RGB EGLConfigChooser removed as it caused crash on some devices.

EGLConfigChoser introduced which selects highest available RGB
configuration. Plus some minor changes in rendering, most of them not
affecting visual output.

Minor changes and fixes made. Plus version code and name increased for
releasing.

Cloud and wave rendering rewritten to use new point shader. Plus some
additional improvements for supporting different sized screens.
Simple 'anti-aliasing' added to plane outline drawing.

GLSL shader compiler support check added. Plus version code and name
increased.

Added preferences for colors, render quality and overall brightness
factor.

Version 2.0 release; constants moved into their own class, plane outline
color
made
customizable, etc etc minor changes.
Added GLSurfaceView.onPause after initialization - just in case.
Cosmetic resource changes made plus prepared for publishing.

Error handling for devices with no support for GLSL shader compiler
improved.

Minor flaw in EGLConfig choosing fixed which could've caused unnecessary
crash under certain conditions.

File proguard.cfg removed and internal default proguard configuration
coming along with SDK taken into use.
Copyright owner names changed to US-ASCII characters only.
Punctuation added to preference summary strings.
